summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Society Maintenance Payment Application. All major features tested successfully including authentication, society management, payment flow (MOCK mode), and dashboard functionality.

fixed_issues.issue: Logger used before definition in server.py line 40
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Moved logging configuration before Razorpay setup

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Chairman and Resident login buttons
Phone OTP authentication for both Chairman and User roles
Bank details and maintenance rates configuration
User society search and join functionality
Different maintenance rates for owners (₹2,000) vs tenants (₹2,500)
Payment flow in MOCK mode with order creation and verification
Notification system for chairman to users
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Backend API endpoints (19/19 tests passed - 100% success rate)
